content:
If you visit the docs for the builtins on roc-lang.org, you will notice a fresh clean look - the product of a lot of iteration.

It is meant to be beautiful in light and dark mode, still carry Rocâ€™s style and personality forward - while being more functional and accessible than before

Please visit the site, and then pull latest and use roc docs on your own libraries and leave us feedback!

https://www.roc-lang.org/builtins/List
I saw the PR got merged and immediately checked out the docs! They are so chef's kiss
Are you happy to take feedback here? @Anthony Bullard
... the new doc's are so pretty :heart_eyes:
You can leave that feedback anywhere you like :blush:
38 messages were moved from this topic to #contributing > New docs template by Anton.
I like to keep the announcements clean for future searching so I moved a bunch of the messages.
